= LocalizedCountrySelect

Rails plugin to provide support for localized <tt><select></tt> province names. Plugin adapted from 
localized_country_select

== Other resources

* http://github.com/rails/country_select (Default Rails plugin)
* http://github.com/russ/country_code_select (Stores country code, not name)


Copyright (c) 2010 Juergen Fesslmeier (@chinshr), released under the MIT license.
